au_192702: mv ~ /dev/null

$ sudo adduser test
$ sudo usermod -aG sudo test

$ sudo su test  # we are now running as test but let's check
$ cd ~; pwd
/home/test

$ sudo mv ~ /dev/null 
mv: cannot overwrite non-directory ‘/dev/null’ with directory ‘/home/test’

sudo mv file /dev/null
